item.description: I am a third-year Ph.D. candidate at the University of Illinois Urbana-Champaign (UIUC), School of Information Sciences. I am passionate about designing and evaluating multi-modal education technology. I also have strong interests in designing for the minority community, e.g., deaf and hard of hearing, ethnic minorities. I work with Prof. Yun Huang (http://yunhuang.web.illinois.edu/) and Prof. Lawerence Angrave (https://cs.illinois.edu/about/people/faculty/angrave). During my undergrad at Tsinghua University, I worked with Prof Pei-Luen Patrick Rau.

Projects (under construction) Online Learning Tools for General Students and DHH (deaf and hard of hearing) Students in STEM Social-emotional and Multimodal Learning Experience Cultural Sustainbility in Minority Groups Publications Si Chen, Yixin Liu, Risheng Lu, Yi-Chieh Lee, Yuqian Zhou and Yun Huang. 2022. “Mirror, Mirror, on the Wall” - Promoting Learners’ Self-Regulated Learning using Affective States Recognition via Facial Movements. Proceedings of the 2022 ACM Designing Interactive Systems Conference.

item.title: Research Interest: Inclusive Education Technology in STEM, Human-AI Interaction, Emotion Intervention
